Njikọ ike mmeghari ohuru na Johannesburg, nke a makwaara dị ka JREC, bụ otu mba na-akwado nkwupụta na The Way Forward on Renewable energy (nkè a makwaara dịka JREC Declaration), nkè emere na World Summit on Sustainable Development na Johannesburg, South Africa, n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2002. Ndị isi óche JREC bụ ndị European Commission na Gọọmentị Morocco.
